About Me: Jeff is a 19 year old native of rural Pennsylvania. As of February, 2019 he is a full time student at Lambda School and aspiring Full Stack Web Developer. In his spare time he enjoys playing guitar, specifically hipster indie stuff, snowboarding and learning about up and coming technologies in his field.
